reviews.text: We stayed here during our trip to Greece, it's a restored 19th century stone house, with lots of character, and small but welt-formed rooms with fireplaces.
reviews.title: Inspiring accomodation in a tiny mountain village

reviews.text: We were the only guests at the time so were given a choice of the rooms available. We took the groun floor room, which was very cosy and with a very comfy bed, and very clean.
reviews.title: Idaniki apodrasi stin oreini Korinthia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next door is a taverna, which served excellent locally produced food at very reasonable prices, which is a good thing as there is nothing else in the village. Very nice views of the mountains though, and excellent for walks.
reviews.title: Great!:-)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we visited this place short after christmas.its a very cosy and warm place to stay..our room had a fireplace and generally what you see in the fotos is exactly what you get and even better...i wish it snowed too so the scenery could be more ideal.the lady at the reception is doing a very good job,and the whole place from the rooms to the dinning room smell clean and nice!the only drowback concerning the area,is that you have to buy some things before you get there,because there are no convenience stores around,just a gas station a couple klm away where you can buy tobacco,drinks and snack food.
reviews.title: The best choice around Zireia mountain.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice stylish accommodation. I feel there like at home. I wish, to be there again:-)
reviews.title: Surprise
